model VehiclePowerTransmissionSystem
  interface block FuelCommandInterface
  interface block PowerInterface
  interface block ClutchInterface
  interface block RoadInterface

  block Engine
    port fuelCommandPort: FuelCommandInterface in
    port powerPort: PowerInterface out
    port clutchPort: ClutchInterface out
  end

  block Transmission
    port powerInput: PowerInterface in
    port clutchInput: ClutchInterface in
    port outputPower: PowerInterface out
  end

  block Clutch
    port inputClutchPort: ClutchInterface in
    port outputClutchPort: ClutchInterface out
  end

  block Driveshaft
    port inputPower: PowerInterface in
    port outputPower: PowerInterface out
  end

  block Differential
    port powerInput: PowerInterface in
    port leftOutput: PowerInterface out
    port rightOutput: PowerInterface out
  end

  block LeftHalfShaft
    port inputPower: PowerInterface in
    port outputPower: PowerInterface out
    connect inputPower to outputPower
  end

  block RightHalfShaft
    port inputPower: PowerInterface in
    port outputPower: PowerInterface out
    connect inputPower to outputPower
  end

  block RearAxleAssembly
    port inputPower: PowerInterface in
    part differential: Differential
    part leftHalfShaft: LeftHalfShaft
    part rightHalfShaft: RightHalfShaft
    connect inputPower to differential.powerInput
    connect differential.leftOutput to leftHalfShaft.inputPower
    connect differential.rightOutput to rightHalfShaft.inputPower
  end

  block Wheel
    port inputPower: PowerInterface in
    port roadInterfacePort: RoadInterface out
  end

  block RoadInterface
    port roadPort: RoadInterface in
  end

  part engine: Engine
  part transmission: Transmission
  part clutch: Clutch
  part driveshaft: Driveshaft
  part rearAxle: RearAxleAssembly
  part leftWheel: Wheel
  part rightWheel: Wheel
  part leftRoadInterface: RoadInterface
  part rightRoadInterface: RoadInterface

  connect engine.powerPort to transmission.powerInput
  connect engine.clutchPort to clutch.inputClutchPort
  connect clutch.outputClutchPort to transmission.clutchInput
  connect transmission.outputPower to driveshaft.inputPower
  connect driveshaft.outputPower to rearAxle.inputPower
  connect rearAxle.leftHalfShaft.outputPower to leftWheel.inputPower
  connect rearAxle.rightHalfShaft.outputPower to rightWheel.inputPower
  connect leftWheel.roadInterfacePort to leftRoadInterface.roadPort
  connect rightWheel.roadInterfacePort to rightRoadInterface.roadPort
end

model DynamicConnectionModel
  class Vehicle
    part chassis : Chassis
    part towBall : TowBall
  end

  class Trailer
    part trailerChassis : Chassis
    part coupler : Coupler
  end

  class Chassis
  end

  class TowBall
    property connected : Boolean
  end

  class Coupler
    part internalStructure : InternalStructure
    property state : String
  end

  class InternalStructure
  end

  constraint SecureLatch
    Trailer.coupler.state == "Engaged" implies TowBall.connected == true
  end

  constraint SmoothSeparation
    Trailer.coupler.state == "Disengaged" implies TowBall.connected == false
  end
end

block VehicleAssemblyWithoutGearboxAndEngine
end

block Gearbox
end

block Engine
end

block VehicleAssemblyWithGearboxWithoutEngine
end

block FullyAssembledVehicle
  part gearbox : Gearbox
  part engine : Engine
end

action InstallGearbox
  input vehicle : VehicleAssemblyWithoutGearboxAndEngine
  input gearbox : Gearbox
  output assembly : VehicleAssemblyWithGearboxWithoutEngine
end

action InstallEngine
  input vehicle : VehicleAssemblyWithGearboxWithoutEngine
  input engine : Engine
  output assembly : FullyAssembledVehicle
end

flow AssemblyProcess
  step installGearbox : InstallGearbox
  step installEngine : InstallEngine
  sequence installGearbox >> installEngine
end

model VehicleQualityAnalysisModel
  class Vehicle
    property engine : Engine
    property transmission : Transmission
    property frontAxleAssembly : FrontAxleAssembly
    property rearAxleAssembly : RearAxleAssembly
    property totalMass : Real
  end Vehicle

  class Engine
    property mass : Real
  end Engine

  class Transmission
    property mass : Real
  end Transmission

  class FrontAxleAssembly
    property mass : Real
  end FrontAxleAssembly

  class RearAxleAssembly
    property mass : Real
  end RearAxleAssembly

  constraint VehicleTotalMassConstraint
    property totalMass : Real
    property engineMass : Real
    property transmissionMass : Real
    property frontAxleMass : Real
    property rearAxleMass : Real
    expression totalMass = engineMass + transmissionMass + frontAxleMass + rearAxleMass
  end VehicleTotalMassConstraint

  class QualityAnalysisRequirement
    property description : String
    property constraintValue : Real
  end QualityAnalysisRequirement

  class AnalysisTask
    property name : String
    property description : String
    property requirement : QualityAnalysisRequirement
    property useCase : QualityAnalysisUseCase
    property result : Real
  end AnalysisTask

  use case DefineQualityAnalysisRequirements
    name: "Define Quality Analysis Requirements"
    description: "Establish measurable quality requirements for vehicle components and systems"
  end DefineQualityAnalysisRequirements

  use case GenerateAnalysisPlans
    name: "Generate Analysis Plans"
    description: "Automatically create analysis tasks and plans based on defined quality objectives"
  end GenerateAnalysisPlans

  use case ExecuteQualityEvaluation
    name: "Execute Quality Evaluation"
    description: "Perform comprehensive quality attribute evaluation of vehicle and components"
  end ExecuteQualityEvaluation
end VehicleQualityAnalysisModel

block MassParameters
  mass: Real
end

block PowerSegment
  start: Duration
  end: Duration
  power: Real
end

block SegmentedPowerOutput
  segments: PowerSegment[*]
end

block AccelerationSequence
  time: Duration[*]
  acceleration: Real[*]
end

block VelocitySequence
  time: Duration[*]
  velocity: Real[*]
end

block PositionSequence
  time: Duration[*]
  position: Real[*]
endconstraintblock VehicleDynamicsConstraint
  parameter mass: Real
  parameter power: Real
  parameter velocity: Real
  parameter acceleration: Real
  equation
    acceleration = power / (mass * velocity)
end

block VehicleMotionSimulationSystem
  massParams: MassParameters
  initialPosition: PositionSequence
  initialVelocity: VelocitySequence
  powerSegments: SegmentedPowerOutput
  timeStep: Duration
  accelerationSequence: AccelerationSequence
  velocitySequence: VelocitySequence
  positionSequence: PositionSequence
  constraint c1: VehicleDynamicsConstraint
    relating
      massParams.mass,
      powerSegments.segments[*].power,
      velocitySequence.velocity,
      accelerationSequence.acceleration
end

model VehicleFuelSystem  
  block FuelTankAssembly  
    property capacity : Float  
    property fuelLevel : Float  
    do  
      action supplyFuel()  
  end FuelTankAssembly  
  
  block Engine  
    property fuelConsumptionRate : Float  
    property operationalStatus : String  
    do  
      action consumeFuel()  
      action returnFuel()  
  end Engine  
  
  block FuelLine  
    property flowRate : Float  
    property direction : String  
  end FuelLine  
  
  block FuelMonitoringSystem  
    property temperatureReading : Float  
    do  
      action monitorTemperature()  
      action transmitData()  
  end FuelMonitoringSystem  
  
  part supplyFuelLine : FuelLine  
  part returnFuelLine : FuelLine  
  part fuelTank : FuelTankAssembly  
  part engine : Engine  
  part monitoringSystem : FuelMonitoringSystem  
  
  reference fuelTank.supplyFuel -> supplyFuelLine  
  reference engine.consumeFuel -> supplyFuelLine  
  reference engine.returnFuel -> returnFuelLine  
  reference fuelTank.supplyFuel <- returnFuelLine  
  
  reference monitoringSystem.monitorTemperature -> supplyFuelLine  
  reference monitoringSystem.monitorTemperature -> returnFuelLine  
  reference monitoringSystem.transmitData -> monitoringSystem.temperatureReading  
end VehicleFuelSystem

model PublishSubscribeSystem

  block Producer
    port publishMessage : PublishMessagePort
  end Producer

  block Server
    port receiveMessage : PublishMessagePort
    port receiveSubscription : SubscriptionRequestPort
    port deliverMessage : DeliverMessagePort
    property subscriptions : List<Subscription>
  end Server

  block Consumer
    port subscribe : SubscriptionRequestPort
    port receiveMessage : DeliverMessagePort
  end Consumer

  block TopicMessage
    property topic : String
    property content : String
  end TopicMessage

  block SubscriptionRequest
    property topic : String
  end SubscriptionRequest

  block Subscription
    property topic : String
    property consumer : Consumer
  end Subscription

  action PublishMessageAction
    input message : TopicMessage
    output message : TopicMessage
  end PublishMessageAction

  action HandleSubscriptionAction
    input request : SubscriptionRequest
    output subscription : Subscription
  end HandleSubscriptionAction

  action DeliverMessageAction
    input message : TopicMessage
    input subscriptions : List<Subscription>
    output deliveredMessages : List<TopicMessage>
  end DeliverMessageAction

  flow PublishMessagePort
    source Producer::publishMessage
    target Server::receiveMessage
  end PublishMessagePort

  flow SubscriptionRequestPort
    source Consumer::subscribe
    target Server::receiveSubscription
  end SubscriptionRequestPort

  flow DeliverMessagePort
    source Server::deliverMessage
    target Consumer::receiveMessage
  end DeliverMessagePort

  Server::subscriptions = collect(Consumer::subscribe->handleSubscription())

  Producer::publishMessage->Server::receiveMessage->publishMessageAction(message)
  Server::receiveSubscription->handleSubscriptionAction(request)
  Server::deliverMessage->deliverMessageAction(message, subscriptions)

end PublishSubscribeSystem
```

model AutomatedPhotographySystem  
  block PhotographySystem  
    part focusProcessor: FocusProcessor  
    part shooter: Shooter  

    behavior automatePhotography  
      input scene: ShootingScene  
      output photograph: Photograph  

      action processFocus  
        input scene: ShootingScene  
        output focusedImage: FocusedImage  
        using focusProcessor.focusProcessing(scene)  
      end action  

      action capturePhoto  
        input image: FocusedImage  
        output photograph: Photograph  
        using shooter.shoot(image)  
      end action  
    end behavior  
  end block  

  block FocusProcessor  
    behavior focusProcessing  
      input scene: ShootingScene  
      output focusedImage: FocusedImage  
    end behavior  
  end block  

  block Shooter  
    behavior shoot  
      input image: FocusedImage  
      output photograph: Photograph  
    end behavior  
  end block  
end model

model PhotographyWorkflowModel  
  block PhotographySystem  
    part sceneAcquisition : SceneAcquisition  
    part focusFunction : FocusFunction  
    part shootingOperation : ShootingOperation  
    part display : Display  

    operation takePhoto()  
      flow takePhoto -> sceneAcquisition.acquireScene : SceneData  
      flow focusFunction.performFocus -> shootingOperation.executeShooting : Photograph  
      flow shootingOperation.executeShooting -> display.displayPhoto : DisplayedImage  
    end takePhoto  
  end PhotographySystem  

  block SceneAcquisition  
    operation acquireScene() : SceneData  
    end acquireScene  
  end SceneAcquisition  

  block FocusFunction  
    operation performFocus(image : SceneData) : FocusedImage  
    end performFocus  
  end FocusFunction  

  block ShootingOperation  
    operation executeShooting(image : FocusedImage) : Photograph  
    end executeShooting  
  end ShootingOperation  

  block Display  
    operation displayPhoto(photo : Photograph) : DisplayedImage  
    end displayPhoto  
  end Display  

  value type SceneData  
  value type FocusedImage  
  value type Photograph  
  value type DisplayedImage  
end PhotographyWorkflowModel

block DigitalCameraShootingSystem
  part viewfindingModule : ViewfindingModule
  part focusingModule : FocusingModule
  part imagingModule : ImagingModule
  behavior shoot : BehaviorDefinition
    step selectScene : viewfindingModule.selectScene()
    step autoFocus : focusingModule.autoFocus(selectedScene)
    step captureImage : imagingModule.captureImage(focusedScene)
    output finalPhoto : HighQualityPhoto = captureImage.result
end

block ViewfindingModule
  action selectScene()
    output selectedScene : Scene
  end
end

block FocusingModule
  action autoFocus(scene : Scene)
    input scene
    output focusedScene : Scene
  end
end

block ImagingModule
  action captureImage(scene : Scene)
    input scene
    output result : HighQualityPhoto
  end
end

valuetype Scene
end

valuetype HighQualityPhoto
end

block VehiclePowerManagementSystem
  part powerStateMachine : PowerStateStateMachine
end

block PowerStateStateMachine
  state offState
    entry: cutOffPowerSupply
  end
  state startPhase
  end
  state poweredOnState
    entry: performSelfDiagnosis
    entry: supplyPowerToFunctionalUnits
    exit: executeSafetyOperations
  end
  transition offToStart
    source: offState
    target: startPhase
    when: vehicleStartCommand
  end
  transition startToPoweredOn
    source: startPhase
    target: poweredOnState
    when: vehicleStartedSignal
  end
  transition poweredOnToOff
    source: poweredOnState
    target: offState
    when: vehicleShutdownCommand
  end
end

block CruiseControlSystem
  part cruiseController : CruiseController
  part speedometer : Speedometer
  part engineSystem : EngineSystem
end block

block CruiseController
  port setSpeedCommand in SetSpeedCommand
  port actualSpeed in ActualSpeed
  port throttleCommand out ThrottleCommand
end block

block Speedometer
  port actualSpeed out ActualSpeed
end block

block EngineSystem
  port throttleCommand in ThrottleCommand
end block

value type SetSpeedCommand
  property value : Real
  dataType Real
end value type

value type ActualSpeed
  property value : Real
  dataType Real
end value type

value type ThrottleCommand
  property value : Real
  dataType Real
end value typeconnector cruiseController.actualSpeed -> speedometer.actualSpeed
connector cruiseController.throttleCommand -> engineSystem.throttleCommand

model VehicleDynamicSimulation  
  block Vehicle  
    part powerSystem: PowerSystem  
    part resistanceModel: ResistanceModel  
    part motionModel: MotionModel  

    parameter mass: Real  
    parameter initialSpeed: Real  
    parameter initialPosition: Real  
    parameter timeStep: Time  
    parameter dragCoefficient: Real  
    parameter rollingResistanceCoefficient: Real  
  end  

  block PowerSystem  
    parameter wheelEndPower: Real  
  end  

  block ResistanceModel  
    parameter aerodynamicDragCoefficient: Real  
    parameter rollingResistanceCoefficient: Real  
    behavior calculateResistiveForce  
      input speed: Real  
      input mass: Real  
      input dragCoefficient: Real  
      input rollingResistanceCoefficient: Real  
      output resistiveForce: Real  
    end  
  end  

  block MotionModel  
    parameter acceleration: Real  
    parameter speed: Real  
    parameter position: Real  
    behavior calculateAcceleration  
      input drivingPower: Real  
      input resistiveForce: Real  
      input mass: Real  
      output acceleration: Real  
    end  
    behavior updateSpeed  
      input initialSpeed: Real  
      input acceleration: Real  
      input timeStep: Time  
      output newSpeed: Real  
    end  
    behavior updatePosition  
      input initialPosition: Real  
      input speed: Real  
      input timeStep: Time  
      output newPosition: Real  
    end  
  end  

  block VehicleSimulation  
    parameter wheelEndPower: Real  
    parameter mass: Real  
    parameter initialSpeed: Real  
    parameter initialPosition: Real  
    parameter timeStep: Time  
    parameter dragCoefficient: Real  
    parameter rollingResistanceCoefficient: Real  
    parameter resistiveForce: Real  
    parameter acceleration: Real  
    parameter newSpeed: Real  
    parameter newPosition: Real  

    part vehicle: Vehicle  
    part powerSystem: PowerSystem  
    part resistanceModel: ResistanceModel  
    part motionModel: MotionModel  

    behavior simulateTimeStep  
      input wheelEndPower: Real  
      input mass: Real  
      input initialSpeed: Real  
      input initialPosition: Real  
      input timeStep: Time  
      input dragCoefficient: Real  
      input rollingResistanceCoefficient: Real  
      output newSpeed: Real  
      output newPosition: Real  

      resistiveForce = resistanceModel.calculateResistiveForce(  
        speed: initialSpeed,  
        mass: mass,  
        dragCoefficient: dragCoefficient,  
        rollingResistanceCoefficient: rollingResistanceCoefficient  
      )  
      acceleration = motionModel.calculateAcceleration(  
        drivingPower: wheelEndPower,  
        resistiveForce: resistiveForce,  
        mass: mass  
      )  
      newSpeed = motionModel.updateSpeed(  
        initialSpeed: initialSpeed,  
        acceleration: acceleration,  
        timeStep: timeStep  
      )  
      newPosition = motionModel.updatePosition(  
        initialPosition: initialPosition,  
        speed: newSpeed,  
        timeStep: timeStep  
      )  
    end  
  end  
end

block Chassis
  property weight : Real[0..1] {non_negative}
end Chassis

block Engine
  property weight : Real[0..1] {non_negative}
end Engine

block Transmission
  property weight : Real[0..1] {non_negative}
end Transmission

block Vehicle
  part chassis : Chassis
  part engine : Engine
  part transmission : Transmission
  property totalWeight : Real[0..1] {non_negative} = chassis.weight + engine.weight + transmission.weight
end Vehicleconstraintblock MaxWeightConstraint
  parameter totalWeight : Real
  parameter maxWeight : Real
  expression totalWeight <= maxWeight
end MaxWeightConstraint

apply Vehicle.totalWeight to MaxWeightConstraint {
  maxWeight = 2500.0
}
```

model VehicleModel
  block Vehicle
    parts:
      chassis : Chassis
      engine : Engine
      transmission : Transmission
    constraints:
      totalMassConstraint : TotalMassConstraint
      dynamicConstraint : DynamicConstraint
  end

  block Chassis
    properties:
      mass : Real
  end

  block Engine
    properties:
      mass : Real
  end

  block Transmission
    properties:
      mass : Real
  end

  constraintblock TotalMassConstraint
    parameters:
      chassisMass : Real
      engineMass : Real
      transmissionMass : Real
    constraints:
      chassisMass + engineMass + transmissionMass <= 2500
  end

  constraintblock DynamicConstraint
    parameters:
      vInitial : Real
      vFinal : Real
      m : Real
      F : Real
      t : Real
    constraints:
      m > 0
      F = m * (vFinal - vInitial) / t
  end
end

block VehicleFuelEconomySystem
  has urbanScenario: UrbanDrivingScenario
  has highwayScenario: HighwayDrivingScenario
  has vehicleParams: VehicleParameters
  has dynamicsAnalysis: VehicleDynamicsAnalysis
  has engineEstimator: EnginePowerEstimator
  has fuelCalculator: FuelConsumptionCalculator
  has fuelEconomyConstraint: FuelEconomyConstraint

  dynamicsAnalysis.uses vehicleParams: VehicleParameters
  dynamicsAnalysis.uses scenario: UrbanDrivingScenario
  engineEstimator.uses dynamicsAnalysis.wheelPower: Power
  engineEstimator.uses vehicleParams.transmissionEfficiency: Efficiency
  fuelCalculator.uses engineEstimator.enginePower: Power
  fuelCalculator.uses vehicleParams.curbWeight: Mass
  fuelCalculator.uses vehicleParams.load: Mass
  fuelEconomyConstraint.uses fuelCalculator.fuelEconomy: FuelEconomy
end

block UrbanDrivingScenario
  speedProfile: Function<Time, Speed>
  trajectory: Function<Time, Distance>
end

block HighwayDrivingScenario
  speedProfile: Function<Time, Speed>
  trajectory: Function<Time, Distance>
end

block VehicleParameters
  curbWeight: Mass
  load: Mass
  wheelDiameter: Length
  transmissionEfficiency: Efficiency
end

block VehicleDynamicsAnalysis
  uses vehicleParams: VehicleParameters
  uses drivingScenario: DrivingScenario
  wheelPower: Power
  acceleration: Acceleration
  energyConsumption: Energy
end

block EnginePowerEstimator
  uses wheelPower: Power
  uses transmissionEfficiency: Efficiency
  enginePower: Power
end

block FuelConsumptionCalculator
  uses enginePower: Power
  uses curbWeight: Mass
  uses load: Mass
  fuelEconomy: FuelEconomy
endconstraint block FuelEconomyConstraint
  fuelEconomyLimit: FuelEconomy = 7.84 @ 'L/100km'
  assert fuelCalculator.fuelEconomy < fuelEconomyLimit
end

type Mass is Real;
type Length is Real;
type Efficiency is Real;
type Power is Real;
type Speed is Real;
type Distance is Real;
type Energy is Real;
type FuelEconomy is Real;
type Time is Real;
```
